text: asalin pa්ranandu – laksha 25
prathijiwaka nawa parisara dushakayak lesa
wiyadama koti bagayayi..
molta kurusayata bahira widyuth sambandhayak natha.
umbaawa me loketa ayithi na.
mudun yataliyata kurupa thabime di ekak thabima ashubha pala dayakaya.
mata mehidi mehem deyakuth sithuna.
ohuta anuwa, ratawal hatharaka thrasthawadaya jayaganimata eksath awasanaye eksath janapadaye nayakathwayen yuth sabhaga men nowa, "prayogika prathipala" langa we.
sirawatama godak aya danayak denne nathi . . . .
eyatak oya prashne thadinma balapala thiyanawa.
wirodhathawaye yedunu pirisa mehidi pradhana karunu thunakata wirodhaya pala kalaha.
wiweki senasurada dinaye sawasa thuna wannata atha.
eka athakata uda indanma pahala balala witharak purudu ayata pahala indala uda balanna awasthawak labadenaekath naraka naha.
sudu kodi sin ekedith indiya sambandhayak thibenawa.
me aya wisin aluthima antharjalayata nikuth kala aluth chayarupa kihipayaki.
eliwenawa,ara yassa gani awith kamare askarala thamange katata hathi watenakalma asarana apita banala pita wenawa.
esema bangaladeshaya me hamuwanne nidahas kusalanayen pasuwayi.
owun rasa windinne githa rasaya nemeyi.

pasuwa me aasanik yedima manushya sanharayak dakwa dura diga giye 1961 wasare di wiyatnam yuddhaye di eewa yedima nisaya.eejant blu nam wu ee sanyogaya guwanin isa garillan marimata thath kala athara in wishala jiwitha wyasanayak ha parisara wyasanayak sidu wiya.

ee wagema rasawath kamenuth aduwak na.

metharam kal wela athuwa apeksha nokalada, yantham ho waruwen sitaganna ithiri padaye kelawara sita hisa dakwa hadisiye gala giya hiriyak, idiriyedi jiwithayata amatharawa ek kala gatha yuthu awadhanamak pilibanda anathuru hangawuye aya pamina ma asalin wathira gaththayin inikbithiwaya.
me athara, awashya piyawara ganima sandaha ema warthawa nithipathi departhamenthuwata saha polis aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata idiripath athi bawath janadhipathiwaraya kiweya.
ese nokalahoth obage jiwithayen niyama prayojanaya obata laba gatha nohaki wanu atha.
eeye pereda api dakka wanasanrakshana departhamenthuwe pa්radhaniya pa්rakashayak karanawa, ‘wilpaththu jathika wanodyanaya thula kisima padinchi kirimak kerala naha’ kiyala.
paswaga thawusan rahath bhawayata pathwuye anathma swabhawaya awabodhakara ganimeni.
me nisama papuwe kassa athi wana bawa kiwahaka.
eeta wadi milakata alewi karana ayata dadi danduwam pamunuwuha.
samahara ewa dakkama ithin bada dagalanawane.

dumwati ha mathdrawya bhawithayen wasarakata 20,000k pamana jiwithakshayata path wana athara,eya tha්rasthawadaya wada balawath wi athi bawada,mema siyalu karunu athulath sandeshayak janadhipathiwaraya wetha bhara dimata katayuthu karana bawada unwahanse mehidi pa්rakasha kalaha.
nadu wibhagawalin anathuruwa mahesthrath adhikaranaya hamuwe pudgalayan 18 denaku saha mahadhikaranaya hamuwe pudgalayan 39 denaku lesa waradikaruwan wi thibe.

api kawuru kawuruth thundora hila karagena bohoma hikmimen me wesak sathiye kalaya gathakala yuthuyi neda kiyala mata hithune wesak gana postuwak liyannata patan ganiddimayi,liyana kiyana de pawa pin ayithiwena thibena pin wardhanaya wena deyak wiyayuthumayi kiyala api siyallanma tharaye adhishtana karagammu, ape rawithuman ithama agana watina aadarshamath kathawak liyamin ewani bana katha malawaka aarambhaya apata labadila thibima gana mata apramana sathutuyi,ithin mageth wesak athdakim kipayak oba siyalu denage sith pahan karawima saha dharma sanwegaya athikirima pinisa liyannata mata kalpanawuna...

ema dakshatha agayime tharangawaliye thawath ek awasan tharangakaruweku wu sath hawiridi tomi dos,eroplen jeli asurum sandaha siyuruwan bana kuda daruwaku lesa nirupanayatath ehi pracharana katayuthu sandahath yoda ganimata apalroth mahatha wisin thora ganna ladi.dos pawasana paridi awasan tharangakaruweku labunu brithanya kasi 10 ha thintha randawanaya brithanya kasi 10 ha thintha randawanayak harenna mbaahuta ehi nirupanaya sandaha kisiwak labi natha.thawada "mahata nirupanaya sandaha kisiwak nolabunath mage ruwa ese dakimata dadi lesa aasha karana athara ma ee sandaha kisindu mudalakda balaporoththu wanneda natha thawada ma samada eroplen jeli kolla lesa handun wanne nam itha aasha karana bawada pawasa atha".[2]

moragahakanda wyapruthiya yatathe madirigiriye sidukerena nawatha padinchi kirime katayuthu wenuwen wananthara helipeheli kirimedi konthrathkaruweku kondesi ullanghanaya karamin katayuthu kara athi bawata chodana ella wanawa.pradeshaya bhara wana niladharin pawasanne me hethuwen rajayata upaya ganimata hakiwa thibu wishala mudalak ahimi wi athi bawayi.moragahakanda - kalugala wyapruthiya yatathe idam ahimi pirisa nawatha padinchi kirima sandaha bisopurata yabada nabadawawa pradeshaya thora gena thibuna.ema pradeshaye hektayara 80kata aasanna pramanayak helipeheli kirime katayuthu arambha kara thibune ee anuwayi.wasara dethunsiyak pamana parani palu, wira, kalumadiriya, halmilla, katakaliya wani dawamaya watinakamak athi durlabha shakawarga walin samanwitha ema pradeshaye winasha wi athi ayuru daknata labuna.wyapruthiya kadinam kirime aramunin konthrathkaruwan dawa gini thaba winasha kara athi bawatayi chodana ella wanne.rataka idiri gamana sandaha sanwardhana katayuthu sidukala yuthu namuth, eya awama parisara haniyakin sidukala yuthu bawa apa sama sithata gathayuthu karunak.
